name: Spin City (QuantM-Labs)
description:
Use WASD or arrow keys to move. Use mousebutton or touch to turn tiles in the map.

Mobile friendly version will come later.

Story: 

John wakes up on a small patch of beach. As he looks around he sees water all around. Behind him is his trusty (not so trusty anymore) boat. In the distance he notices a structure. Something he remembered from long ago. It should be a piece of his own civilization. Now comes his challenge...can he use his land altering abilities to get to the end goal? The pilar of convergence?

Can he get back to Spin City? What is Spin City? ....more to explore?
